caption.p: Crystal structure of NMAb binding to RBD. ( a) 80â€‰R (light green) imitates ACE2 binding to the interface (purple) on RBD of SARS-CoV (PDB: 7BZ5); ( b) m396 (orange) binds to RBD of SARS-CoV without functionally mimicking ACE2, preventing RBD from binding to ACE2 (PDB: 2DD8). ( c) CB6 (sky blue) functionally mimics ACE2 binding to the interface (hot pink) on RBD of SARS-CoV-2 (PDB: 7C01); ( d) S309 (grass green) binds to RBD of SARS-CoV-2 without blocking the binding of RBD to ACE2 (PDB: 6WPS). ( e) The SARS-CoV-specific NMAb CR3022 (purple) binds to RBD of SARS-CoV-2 without blocking the binding of RBD of SARS-CoV-2 to ACE2 (PDB: 6W41)
